Tool

NameMerge Layers
ID2
AuthorV.Olaya (c) 2004

Description

Merge vector layers.

Parameters

NameTypeIdentifierDescriptionConstraints
Input
Layers Shapes list (input)INPUTOutput will inherit shape type and table structure from the first layer in this list.
Output
Merged LayerShapes (output)MERGED
Options
Add Source InformationBooleanSRCINFOAdds a field with the name of the original input data set.Default: 1
Match Fields by NameBooleanMATCHDefault: 1
